title: 07/24: Live 3-WR PPR Draft! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Follow along as we draft a 12-team, 3-WR, PPR league with industry experts. One of us takes WRs in Rounds 1 and 2 before waiting a while for WR3. All of us prioritize TE. Find out which other draft trends we notice today. Surprises include: DeAndre Hopkins as the third WR off the board; Corey Davis going earlier than we expected; what people are thinking about the JAC WRs right now.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
